description: This file implements the creation, deletion, and initialization functions for a string component object. It includes object construction (`AnscStringCOCreate`), destruction (`AnscStringCORemove`), object enrollment (`AnscStringCOEnrollObjects`), and initialization (`AnscStringCOInitialize`) functions, along with setting up various string manipulation methods within an object-oriented C style architecture.

classes.name: ANSC_STRING_OBJECT
classes.description: The primary object representing a string component, with function pointers for string operations and internal state.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscStringCOCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and initializes a new string component object, setting up its function pointers.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscStringCORemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the string component object and frees allocated memory.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscStringCOEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls necessary sub-objects or resources required by the string component.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscStringCOInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the string component object, including setting function pointers for string operations.
